acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.body: By creating an account or using Beautiful Encer, you agree to these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use the Service.

accounts.title: Accounts & Responsibilities
accounts.body: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activities that occur under your account. You must provide accurate information and comply with all applicable laws.

usage.title: Acceptable Use
items: Do not misuse, abuse, or interfere with the platform.
Do not attempt to access data you are not authorized to access.
Do not upload content that is unlawful, infringing, or harmful.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.body: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Beautiful Encer shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the Service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.body: We may update these Terms from time to time. Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

dataWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
items: Account information (name, email, role, and profile details).
Usage data and device information for security and analytics.
Social media public data when you connect your accounts.

useOfData.title: How We Use Your Data
items: To provide and improve our services and features.
To ensure platform security, fraud prevention, and compliance.
To communicate with you regarding important updates.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.body: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data as permitted by law. Contact support if you wish to exercise these rights.

changes.title: Changes to this Policy
changes.body: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes as required.

landing.tagline: Connecting Beauty Salons with Authentic Influencers

hero.title: Connect With
hero.subtitle: Authentic Influencers
hero.description: The ultimate platform for discovering, analyzing, and collaborating with nano and micro-influencers on Instagram and TikTok.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Powerful Features
features.description: Everything you need to manage influencer relationships and campaigns

discover.title: Discover Influencers
discover.description: Search and filter nano and micro-influencers by niche, region, follower count, and engagement metrics to find the perfect match for your brand.

analytics.title: Performance Analytics
analytics.description: Track follower growth, engagement rates, likes, comments, and shares with comprehensive analytics dashboard and real-time insights.

campaign.title: Campaign Management
campaign.description: Launch, monitor, and optimize influencer campaigns with real-time performance tracking, automated reporting, and ROI analysis.

messaging.title: Direct Messaging
messaging.description: Communicate seamlessly with influencers through our integrated messaging system without leaving the platform. Chat, share files, and collaborate.

step1.title: Register & Connect
step1.description: Influencers create profiles and connect their Instagram and TikTok accounts for verification. Quick and easy onboarding process.

step2.title: Automatic Data Collection
step2.description: System automatically collects public metrics including followers, engagement, and post performance. No manual entry required.

step3.title: Performance Scoring
step3.description: Advanced algorithms analyze data to generate comprehensive influencer performance scores and audience insights.

step4.title: Connect & Collaborate
step4.description: Start conversations, build relationships, and launch successful campaigns with verified influencers in your niche.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChoose.subtitle: Built specifically for nano and micro-influencer campaigns
whyChoose.testimonial: This platform revolutionized how we connect with micro-influencers. The analytics and messaging tools are exceptional!

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of influencers and brands already growing together
cta.descriptionAlt: Join thousands of brands and influencers building authentic partnerships

footer.tagline: Connecting beauty salons with authentic influencers
